title: Flickr for magazines
content: [issuu](http://web.archive.org/web/20080208062742/http:/issuu.com/) is now the only newsstand in the world so awesome that one would really need to use profanity to describe the awesomeness within. Iâ€™ll leave it to you to poke around and decide just what profanities best describe it.
author: James Puckett
